body_html:
As I understand it, the formula as it is before this PR is y log (x + eps) + (1-y) log (1 - x + eps)
Maybe it's better to don't use the eps at all and instead check if the input to log is 0?

In the original issue it looks like the error is 1.00000e-12 * -1.0001 which is really not too bad unless the sign of the output really matters.

body:
As I understand it, the formula as it is before this PR is `y log (x + eps) + (1-y) log (1 - x + eps)`
Maybe it's better to don't use the `eps` at all and instead check if the input to log is 0?

In the original issue it looks like the error is `1.00000e-12 * -1.0001` which is really not too bad unless the sign of the output really matters.
